title.rendered: Park Facing Bungalow For Sale In Shanti Niketan

content.rendered:
Prepared to be impressed when you experience this beautiful location set on an 800sq yds land on a super peaceful wide street, Overlooking an extremely well-maintained park. This attractive corner bungalow suits demolition and you can rebuild your new dream abode (Permissible area 24000 sqft) according to your taste, specs, and needs. This park-facing bungalow is located in Shanti Niketan which is one of the poshest localities in South New Delhi. Shanti Niketan is an exclusive Premium housing neighborhood situated right next to Chanakyapuri, Anand Niketan, West End Colony, and Vasant Vihar, and houses many HNI and Renowned high profile Industrialists. There are lots of parks in this Gated Colony

♕Bungalow
♕Shanti Niketan
♕800 Sqyds
♕Park Facing
♕Peaceful Wide Street
♕Asking: 76CR

Lalit Kaushik

Call On 98183-12077 For Site Visit

http://wa.me/919818312077

Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings Here
ROYALE REALTORS INDIA

Royale Realtors India – Luxury Real Estate

19 DDA Market, Shanti Niketan, New Delhi, Delhi 110021

***image used is for illustration purposes only.
